projects.name: Coal Chat App - Smart India Hackathon
projects.description: GenerativeAI Chat Bot: Developed a modern chatbot powered by a custom Language Model (LLM) built on open-source technologies. Ministry of Coal Focus: The chatbot is specifically designed to respond to all text queries related to the Ministry of Coal, providing accurate and timely information. User-Friendly Experience: Utilizing Langchain, TensorFlow, and Chroma DB, the chat app ensures a seamless and user-friendly experience, built with Next.js to enhance usability and accessibility.

projects.name: Real Time Chat Application
projects.description: Real-Time Chat Application: Utilized the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) along with Socket.io for instant communication. Comprehensive Features: Implemented user authentication, contact management, and both one-on-one and group messaging with support for media sharing. Seamless Communication: Ensured seamless communication with real-time message status indicators and notifications for enhanced user experience.

projects.name: React Admin Dashboard With Real time Data, Charts, Events, Kanban, CRM
projects.description: React Admin Dashboard: Developed using React and GraphQL, integrates real-time data, dynamic charts, event management, Kanban boards, and CRM. Intuitive Interface: Enables administrators to monitor metrics, manage tasks, schedule events, and oversee customer relationships. Efficient Management: Dynamic data visualization, Kanban boards, real-time updates, and event scheduling enhance efficiency.

experiences.role_name: App Development & MERN Stack Trainee Intern
experiences.description: Gained hands-on experience in XML for front-end and Java for back-end, including Firebase integration, at Revamp Academy. Developed a Facebook clone frontend with login authentication and honed web development skills in the MERN stack, completing various projects.
